Summary._: [1] trains are bypassing 181 St in both directions because of a water condition at 181 St.

Description._:
[1] trains are bypassing 181 St in both directions because of a water condition at 181 St.

Our crews are on site to fix it ASAP and we'll follow up soon. Stay tuned for updates.

LongDescription:
[1] trains are bypassing 181 St in both directions because of a water condition at 181 St.
Our crews are on site to fix it ASAP and we'll follow up soon. Stay tuned for updates.

Summary._: [F] train service changes and delays because of switch problems at York St. Details at mta.info

Description._:
Southbound [F] trains are stopping along the [A] line from W 4 St-Wash Sq to Jay St-MetroTech.

Some northbound [F] trains are stopping along the [G] line from Bergen St to Court Sq then on the [E] line to Jackson Hts-Roosevelt Av.

Some southbound [F] trains end at 2 Av.

Expect delays on [A] [C] [F] and [G] trains.

These service changes are because of switch and signal problems at York St.

LongDescription:
Southbound [F] trains are stopping along the [A] line from W 4 St-Wash Sq to Jay St-MetroTech.
Some northbound [F] trains are stopping along the [G] line from Bergen St to Court Sq then on the [E] line to Jackson Hts-Roosevelt Av. 
Some southbound [F] trains end at 2 Av. 
Expect delays on [A] [C] [F] and [G] trains. 
These service changes are because of switch and signal problems at York St.

Summary._: [G] trains are running with delays in both directions because of signal problems at Court Sq.

Description._: [G] trains are running with delays in both directions because of signal problems at Court Sq.

LongDescription: [G] trains are running with delays in both directions because of signal problems at Court Sq.
